# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
We currently provide security updates for the following versions of NET-Shell:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | ✅ Yes             |
| < 1.0   | ❌ No              |

## Reporting a Vulnerability
**Do not open a public issue for security vulnerabilities.**

If you discover a security flaw in NET-Shell (e.g., a way to cause unintended local execution or data leaks), please report it responsibly:

1. Email the maintainer at `prakhar.btech2024@ieccollege.com`.
2. Provide a detailed summary of the vulnerability and a proof-of-concept if possible.
3. We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and coordinate a fix.

## Disclaimer
NET-Shell is for **educational and authorized testing only**. The maintainers are not responsible for misuse of this tool on unauthorized targets.
